reviewText: Although this DVD was released in 2009, it is footage of UB40's July 1981 concert in Cologne Germany. It was filmed for the German Rockpalast TV series. This concert took place in the early days of UB40. The group had only just released their second album, 'Present Arms'. So, most of the song on this DVD are from 'Present Arms' (which was enjoying the #2 spot on the UK charts at that time), as well as their first album 'Signing Off'. DVD TRACK LISTING: Present Arms Tyler King Food for Thought The Earth Dies Screaming Don't Let It Pass You By Lamb's Bread Silent Witness Sardonicus One in Ten Madam Medusa Don't Slow Down Dr. X Burden of Shame Singing Off This concert took place just two years after their first gig in their hometown of Birmingham, UK. It's vintage UB40 with young Ali Campbell as Lead Vocals, playing the Rhythm Guitar. Robin Campbell is Lead Guitar and also Vocals. James Brown is on Drums and Vocals. All of them look so young! Remember, it's 1981 and UB40 had only just released their 2nd album! You'll certainly enjoy this concert featuring UB40 as a fresh new act! SEE MY PHOTOS IN CUSTOMER IMAGES DVD SPECS: Screen Format 4:3 Audio: DTS, Dolby 5.1, Dolby Digital Stereo Running Time: 81 minutes Food For Thought - Greatest Hits Live is a must have for any UB40 fan or collector of classic reggae. ALSO RECOMMENDED: Labour of Love IV - the latest album by UB40 released in 2010
